src:
Tantang Timnas Indonesia U-19, Persiapan Timor Leste Kurang Ideal
05 Nov 2019, 17:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Timor Leste U-19 akan berhadapan dengan Timnas Indonesia U-19 pada partai perdana Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Duel kedua negara bakal berlangsung di Stadion Madya, Senayan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Asisten pelatih Timor Leste, Eduardo Pereira mengungkapkan kesiapan timnya jelang laga tersebut. Dia menyebut bahwa pasukannya sudah siap tempur meski persiapannya tak ideal.
"Persiapannya kurang maksimal. Tapi untuk saat ini saya membawa 23 pemain, dan persiapannya waktu terakhir tiba di Jakarta tanggal 21 Oktober, ada lima hari kita persiapan disini," ujar Eduardo saat sesi konferensi pers di Hotel Atlet Century, Senayan, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11).
"Saya kira siap untuk bertanding dan menghasilkan hasil yang baik untuk negara saya," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Challenge the Indonesian national team U-19, Preparation of Timor Leste Less Ideal
05 Nov 2019, 17:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timor Leste U-19 national team will face the Indonesian U-19 national team in the inaugural party of Group K AFC U-19 Qualification 2020. The duel between the two countries will take place at Madya Stadium, Senayan, Jakarta, Wednesday (6/11) 2019).
East Timor's assistant coach, Eduardo Pereira, revealed his team's readiness ahead of the match. He said that his troops were ready to fight even though the preparations were not ideal.
"The preparations are less than optimal. But for the time being I brought 23 players, and the preparations when we last arrived in Jakarta on October 21, there are five days we prepare here," Eduardo said during a press conference session at the Century Athlete Hotel, Senayan, Jakarta, Tuesday ( 5/11).
"I think it is ready to compete and produce good results for my country," he added.
